inventory.commentary: Revised PENN file combined senses 1 and 2, added examples and commentary. ahouston 26sep06 added dummy sense 2. ahouston

sense.name: commercial product strategies
sense.commentary: MARKETING[+event][+activity][+commercial][+product][+strategy] a strategy for selling products that includes advertisement, promotion, analysis, distribution
sense.examples: The product failed because of poor marketing. They're going to try direct marketing for their line of kitchen utensils. John does marketing research for a firm in New York. The cellphone makers have succeeded in lowering their marketing costs. That entrepreneur loves inventing things but hates the marketing of them.

sense.name: Going to market
sense.commentary: MARKETING[+event][+activity][+personal][+shopping] The act of shopping at the market.
sense.examples: John did the weekly marketing at the supermarket. I do my marketing at three different grocery stores.

sense.name: People who promote, etc.
sense.commentary: MARKETING[+enterprise][+commercial][+department] The people involved in development, promotion, and sales, either as individuals or as a collective.
sense.examples: Have you sent the files to Marketing yet? We have a new director of marketing. Marketing doesn't have a good grasp of the technology they are trying to sell.
